name: Old Twitch.tv Font Style
description:
Reverts the changes of the Twitch.tv redesign released on September 29th, 2019 (https://twitter.com/Twitch/status/1177259718135427072).

Simple font style change, feel free to edit it more if you''re knowledgeable!

user.name: LunaGore
user.about: Variety Twitch streamer and Web Developer.

additional_info: 1.1 - Added options to change background color for both Light & Dark theme. To use either removed the "/**/" surrounding the background-color tag. Do NOT try to use both because it will take the bottom option and use it.
